hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within a 5% range for 10+ days during a NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent 5% breakout in either direction will initiate a new directional regime (BULL/BEAR) with 70% probability, and the initial 48-hour momentum will continue for 5+ trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility during neutral periods represents pent-up energy. Breakouts from such compression often signal institutional positioning shifts and trend initiation rather than false moves. The 48-hour follow-through validates regime transition.
entry_conditions: BTC closes >5% above 10-day high OR <-5% below 10-day low

exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if no regime shift confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but price reverses to pre-breakout range within 3 days >40% of occurrences, or volatility expands without directional conviction.
